Package academy.mindswap.server.singleplayer_commands

Class DifficultyMode

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.server.singleplayer_commands.DifficultyMode
Direct Known Subclasses:
EasyDifficultyMode, HardDifficultyMode
public abstract class DifficultyMode extends Object
Abstract Class that is to be extended from all the Difficulty Mode classes.

      Implements the logic of the question and answer and different commands in the different modes
      Parameters:

      questions - - list of questions to be used
      Throws:
      IOException - If an input or output exception occurs
      InterruptedException - If an interruption exception occurs
